data.description:
Reject Humanity: Embrace your primal instincts in VR with a locomotion method that mimics the agility of gorillas. Navigate by using only your hands and arms—no buttons, no sticks, no teleportation. Leap off surfaces to jump and grip with both hands to scale obstacles.

Embark on thrilling adventures across six distinct levels, each with unique topography that challenges your gorilla-like agility. Run from other gorillas or hunt down survivors with parkour moves up trees and cliffs. Whether swinging through a virtual jungle with strangers or gathering in private rooms with friends, the experience offers endless possibilities for socializing and gameplay.

Choose from four diverse game modes: Tag for intense chases with up to 3 players, Infection for strategic battles with 4 or more, Hunt where every player pursues a personal target, and Paintbrawl—a team-based paintball skirmish using slingshots and strategy.

Unleash your inner gorilla and roam freely in a world where movement is intuitive yet challenging to master. Crossplay with PC ensures you can connect with players on any platform. Visit the City store for a rotating inventory of items to personalize your monke avatar and express your unique identity.

Embrace your wild side. Become Gorilla.
